/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street below is a hive of activity, with cars and buses navigating their way through the city's arteries. The buildings that line the street are tall and modern, their facades painted in shades of red and orange, standing out against the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly overhead, casting a warm glow on the scene below. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, encapsulating the energy and dynamism of the city.
